Title: Force Majeure
Actors: Johannes Kuhnke, Lisa Loven Kongsli, Clara Wettergren, Vincent Wettergren
Plot: A family vacationing in the French Alps is confronted with a devastating avalanche.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 31 wins & 39 nominations.
Production: Plattform Produktion, Film Väst, Société Parisienne de Production, Coproduction Office, Beofilm, Motlys
